props.name: delay
props.description: Controls whether and how long to delay rendering the SkeletonBox. Set to true to delay by 1000ms, or provide a custom number of milliseconds.

props.name: width
props.description: Width of the skeleton box. Accepts any valid CSS `width` value.

props.name: height
props.description: Height of the skeleton box. Accepts any valid CSS `height` value.

props.name: className
props.description: The className of the skeleton box
